mapper.select: SELECT ob.objt_id AS objectId ,sob.objt_id AS subObjectId FROM cfl_object ob INNER JOIN cfl_object_subobject_mapping sobm ON ob.objt_seq = sobm.objt_seq INNER JOIN cfl_object sob ON sobm.sub_objt_seq = sob.objt_seq WHERE ob.svc_nm = #{serviceName} AND ob.tnnt_id = #{tenantId} ORDER BY sob.objt_id

SELECT ob.objt_id AS objectId , auth.auth_seq AS authoritySequence , auth.auth_id AS authorityId , auth.auth_nm AS authorityName , auth.auth_type AS authorityType , auth.tnnt_id AS tenantId , auth.svc_nm AS serviceName FROM cfl_object ob INNER JOIN cfl_object_authority_mapping authm ON ob.objt_seq = authm.objt_seq INNER JOIN cfl_authority auth ON auth.auth_seq = authm.auth_seq WHERE ob.svc_nm = #{serviceName} AND ob.tnnt_id = #{tenantId} ORDER BY auth.auth_nm

SELECT auth.auth_id AS authorityId , user.user_seq AS userSequence , user.user_id AS userId , user.user_type AS userType , user.tnnt_id AS tenantId , user.svc_nm AS serviceName FROM cfl_authority auth INNER JOIN cfl_authority_user_mapping aum ON auth.auth_seq = aum.auth_seq INNER JOIN cfl_user user ON user.user_seq = aum.user_seq WHERE auth.svc_nm = #{serviceName} AND auth.tnnt_id = #{tenantId} ORDER BY user.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cfl_object_authority_mapping (objt_seq, auth_seq) VALUES( (SELECT objt_seq FROM cfl_object WHERE svc_nm = #{authority.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{authority.tenantId} AND objt_id =#{objectId}) , (SELECT auth_seq FROM cfl_authority WHERE svc_nm = #{authority.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{authority.tenantId} AND auth_id = #{authority.authorityId}) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cfl_object_authority_mapping WHERE objt_seq = (SELECT objt_seq FROM cfl_object WHERE svc_nm = #{authority.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{authority.tenantId} AND objt_id =#{objectId}) AND auth_seq = (SELECT auth_seq FROM cfl_authority WHERE svc_nm = #{authority.serviceName} AND tnnt_id = #{authority.tenantId} AND auth_id = #{authority.authorityId})

SELECT * FROM cfl_code cd WHERE cd.svc_nm = #{serviceName} AND cd.tnnt_id = #{tenantId} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM cfl_code_subcode_mapping scdm WHERE cd.cd_seq = scdm.sub_cd_seq )

SELECT * FROM cfl_code cd WHERE cd.svc_nm = #{serviceName} AND cd.tnnt_id = #{tenantId} AND cd.use_yn = '1' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM cfl_code_subcode_mapping scdm WHERE cd.cd_seq = scdm.sub_cd_seq )
